member.name: T:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions
member.summary: Easing functions derived from AHEasing, a library of easing functions. Credit goes to warrenm author of AHEasing.

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.Linear(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after the line y = x

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.QuadraticEaseIn(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after the parabola y = x^2

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.QuadraticEaseOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after the parabola y = -x^2 + 2x

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.QuadraticEaseInOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after the piecewise quadratic y = (1/2)((2x)^2) ; [0, 0.5) y = -(1/2)((2x-1)*(2x-3) - 1) ; [0.5, 1]

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.CubicEaseIn(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after the cubic y = x^3

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.CubicEaseOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after the cubic y = (x - 1)^3 + 1

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.CubicEaseInOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after the piecewise cubic y = (1/2)((2x)^3) ; [0, 0.5) y = (1/2)((2x-2)^3 + 2) ; [0.5, 1]

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.QuarticEaseIn(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after the quartic x^4

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.QuarticEaseOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after the quartic y = 1 - (x - 1)^4

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.QuarticEaseInOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after the piecewise quartic y = (1/2)((2x)^4) ; [0, 0.5) y = -(1/2)((2x-2)^4 - 2) ; [0.5, 1]

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.QuinticEaseIn(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after the quintic y = x^5

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.QuinticEaseOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after the quintic y = (x - 1)^5 + 1

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.QuinticEaseInOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after the piecewise quintic y = (1/2)((2x)^5) ; [0, 0.5) y = (1/2)((2x-2)^5 + 2) ; [0.5, 1]

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.SineEaseIn(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after quarter-cycle of sine wave

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.SineEaseOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after quarter-cycle of sine wave (different phase)

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.SineEaseInOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after half sine wave

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.CircularEaseIn(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after shifted quadrant IV of unit circle

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.CircularEaseOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after shifted quadrant II of unit circle

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.CircularEaseInOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after the piecewise circular function y = (1/2)(1 - Mathf.Sqrt(1 - 4x^2)) ; [0, 0.5) y = (1/2)(Mathf.Sqrt(-(2x - 3)*(2x - 1)) + 1) ; [0.5, 1]

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.ExponentialEaseIn(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after the exponential function y = 2^(10(x - 1))

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.ExponentialEaseOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after the exponential function y = -2^(-10x) + 1

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.ExponentialEaseInOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after the piecewise exponential y = (1/2)2^(10(2x - 1)) ; [0,0.5) y = -(1/2)*2^(-10(2x - 1))) + 1 ; [0.5,1]

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.ElasticEaseIn(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after the damped sine wave y = Mathf.Sin(13pi/2*x)*Mathf.Pow(2, 10 * (x - 1))

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.ElasticEaseOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after the damped sine wave y = Mathf.Sin(-13pi/2*(x + 1))*Mathf.Pow(2, -10x) + 1

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.ElasticEaseInOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after the piecewise exponentially-damped sine wave: y = (1/2)*Mathf.Sin(13pi/2*(2*x))*Mathf.Pow(2, 10 * ((2*x) - 1)) ; [0,0.5) y = (1/2)*(Mathf.Sin(-13pi/2*((2x-1)+1))*Mathf.Pow(2,-10(2*x-1)) + 2) ; [0.5, 1]

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.BackEaseIn(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after the overshooting cubic y = x^3-x*Mathf.Sin(x*pi)

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.BackEaseOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after overshooting cubic y = 1-((1-x)^3-(1-x)*Mathf.Sin((1-x)*pi))

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.BackEaseInOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after the piecewise overshooting cubic function: y = (1/2)*((2x)^3-(2x)*Mathf.Sin(2*x*pi)) ; [0, 0.5) y = (1/2)*(1-((1-x)^3-(1-x)*Mathf.Sin((1-x)*pi))+1) ; [0.5, 1]

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.BounceEaseIn(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after the piecewise overshooting cubic function.

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.BounceEaseOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after the piecewise overshooting cubic function.

member.name: M:MarkLight.Animation.EasingFunctions.BounceEaseInOut(System.Single)
member.summary: Easing modeled after the piecewise overshooting cubic function.

member.name: T:MarkLight.View
member.d: Base class for all view models in the framework. All view models must be a subclass of this class to be processed and managed the framework.

member.name: F:MarkLight.View.Id
member.d: Specifies a unique ID for the view. Used to map the view to reference fields on the parent view model. Provides a way to reference the view in data bindings. Is used as selectors in styles.

member.name: F:MarkLight.View.Style
member.d: Used as selector by the styles. Specifies the name of the style that is to be applied to the view and any children that explicitly inherits its style. The style is applied when the view is created (usually in the editor as the XUML is processed).

member.name: F:MarkLight.View.BasedOn
member.d: Used in style definition to specify which style it's based on.

member.name: F:MarkLight.View.Theme
member.d: Specifies the name of the theme that is applied to the view and its children. The theme determines which set of styles are to be considered when applying matching styles to the view.

member.name: F:MarkLight.View.BaseDirectory
member.d: Specifies the base directory to be used by the view and its children. The base directory is used when loading resources such as sprites, fonts, etc.

member.name: F:MarkLight.View.UnitSize
member.d: Specifies the user-defined unit size to be used by the view and its children. Used when element size is specified in user-defined units to convert it into pixels.

member.name: F:MarkLight.View.LayoutParent
member.d: The layout parent view is the direct ascendant of the current view in the scene object hierarchy.

member.name: F:MarkLight.View.Parent
member.d: The parent of the view is the logical parent to which this view belongs. In the XUML any view you can see has the current view as its logical parent.

member.name: F:MarkLight.View.Content
member.d: View that is the parent to the content of this view. Usually it is the current view itself but when a ContentPlaceholder is used the Content points to the view that contains the ContentPlaceholder.

member.name: F:MarkLight.View.State
member.d: View state name. Determines state values to be applied to the view. All views start out in the "Default" state and when the state changes the values associated with that state are applied to the view.

member.name: F:MarkLight.View.IsActive
member.summary: Indicates if the view is enabled.
member.d: Activates/deactivates the view. If set to false in this or in any parent view, all components are disabled, attached renderers are turned off, etc. Any components attached will no longer have Update() called.

member.name: F:MarkLight.View.HideFlags
member.summary: Hide flags for the game object.
member.d: Bit mask that controls object destruction, saving and visibility in editor.

member.name: F:MarkLight.View.GameObject
member.summary: GameObject the view is attached to.
member.d: GameObject that the view is attached to.

member.name: F:MarkLight.View.Transform
member.summary: Position, rotation and scale of the view.
member.d: The view transform is used to manipulate the position, rotation and scale of the view in relation to the layout parent view's transform or in world space. The transform is sometimes manipulated indirectly through other view fields and through the view model's internal layout logic.

member.name: F:MarkLight.View.Position
member.d: The local position of the view in relation to the layout parent view transform.

member.name: F:MarkLight.View.Rotation
member.d: The local rotation of the view in relation to the layout parent view transform. Stored as a Quaternion but specified in XUML as euler angles.

member.name: F:MarkLight.View.Scale
member.d: The scale of the view in relation to the layout parent view transform.

member.name: F:MarkLight.View.Item
member.d: Provides a mechanism to bind to dynamic list data. The item is set, e.g. by the List view on the child views it generates for its dynamic list data. The Item points to the list item data the view is associated with.

member.name: F:MarkLight.View.IsTemplate
member.summary: Indicates if this view is to be used as a template.
member.d: A template view is used to create dynamic instances of the view. Used by certain views such as the List and TabPanel.

member.name: F:MarkLight.View.Activated
member.d: Triggered every time the view is activated. Also triggered once the view is intialized if it starts out activated.

member.name: F:MarkLight.View.Deactivated
member.d: Triggered every time the view is deactivated. Also triggered once the view is intialized if it starts out deactivated.

member.name: F:MarkLight.View.IsDestroyed
member.summary: Indicates if the view has been destroyed by GameObject.Destroy().

member.name: F:MarkLight.View.IsDynamic
member.summary: Indicates if the view has been created dynamically.

member.name: F:MarkLight.View.PropagateChildLayoutChanges
member.summary: Indicates if the view propagates child layout changes.
member.d: Boolean indicating if view propagates child layout changes. Generally set to true whenever a view adjusts its size to child layout changes.

member.name: F:MarkLight.View.ViewTypeName
member.summary: The name of the view's type.

member.name: F:MarkLight.View.ViewXumlName
member.summary: Name of the view as specified in the XUML.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:MarkLight.Views.UI.Button
member.d: The button view is a clickable region with text. Has the states: Default, Highlighted, Pressed and Disabled. The button can be set to toggle through IsToggleButton and to adjust its size to its text through the AdjustToText field.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.Button.ButtonLabel
member.d: The button label arranges and displays the button text.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.Button.Text
member.d: The text of the button label. The button can be set to adjust its size to the text through the AdjustToText field.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.Button.Font
member.d: The font of the button label text.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.Button.FontSize
member.d: The size of the button label text.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.Button.LineSpacing
member.d: The line spacing of the button label text.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.Button.SupportRichText
member.d: Boolean indicating if the button label supports rich text.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.Button.FontColor
member.d: The font color of the button label text.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.Button.FontStyle
member.d: The font style of the button label text.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.Button.TextMargin
member.d: The margin of the button label text. Can be used to adjust the text positioning. If AdjustToText is used the TextPadding field is used to add padding.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.Button.TextAlignment
member.d: The alignment of the text inside the button label. Can be used with TextMargin and TextOffset to get desired positioning of the text.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.Button.TextOffset
member.d: The offset of the button label. Can be used with TextMargin and TextAlignment to get desired positioning of the text.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.Button.ShadowColor
member.d: The shadow color of the button label text.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.Button.ShadowDistance
member.d: The distance of the button label text shadow.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.Button.OutlineColor
member.d: The outline color of the button label text.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.Button.OutlineDistance
member.d: The distance of the button label text outline.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.Button.AdjustToText
member.d: An enum indiciating how the button should adjust its size to the label text. By default the button does not adjust its size to the text. Is used in conjunction with the TextPadding field to get the desired size of the button in relation to its text.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.Button.IsToggleButton
member.summary: Indicates if this button is set to toggle.
member.d: If IsToggleButton is set to true the button will toggle between pressed and unpressed (default) state when clicked.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.Button.IsDisabled
member.summary: Indicates if the button is disabled.
member.d: If set to true the button enters the "Disabled" state and can't be interacted with.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.Button.ToggleValue
member.d: If the button is a toggle button (IsToggleButton is set to true) the toggle value indicates the toggle state of the button. If pressed the ToggleValue is true.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.Button.TextPadding
member.d: The button TextPadding is used when AdjustToText is set. It determines the additional padding to be added to the size of the button when it adjusts to the text.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.Button.CanToggleOn
member.summary: Indicates if user can toggle on the button.
member.d: Boolean indicating if the button can be toggled on by user interaction. If set to false the button can only be toggled on programmatically.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.Button.CanToggleOff

member.name: T:MarkLight.Views.UI.UICanvas
member.d: The canvas view is used to render UI components and controls things like draw sort order, scaling and render mode. In order for UIViews to be rendered and positioned correctly they must be put under a parent UICanvas or a subclass of (like UserInterface).

member.summary: Indicates if rendering should be pixel perfect.
member.d: Indicates if the canvas is to be aligned with pixels. Only applied if render mode is set to ScreenSpace.

member.d: Canvas draw order within a sorting layer.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UICanvas.RenderCamera
member.d: Camera used for sizing the canvas when in render mode set to: Screen Space - Camera. Also used as camera that events will be sent through in world space.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UICanvas.PlaneDistance
member.d: The plane distance determines how far away from the camera the canvas is generated.

member.summary: Unique ID of the canvas sorting layer.
member.d: Unique ID of the canvas sorting layer.

member.summary: Name of the canvas sorting layer.
member.d: Name of the canvas sorting layer.

member.d: Canvas draw order within a sorting layer.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UICanvas.OverridePixelPerfect
member.d: Boolean indicating if the pixel perfect setting should be overriden (not inherited from parent canvas).

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UICanvas.Canvas
member.d: The canvas component renders the UI components using specified settings.

member.d: Determines how the children within the canvas are scaled.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UICanvas.ScaleFactor
member.d: Scales all children within the canvas by this factor.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UICanvas.ReferencePixelsPerUnit
member.d: If a sprite has 'Pixels Per Unit' setting, one pixel in the sprite will cover one unit in the UI.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UICanvas.DynamicPixelsPerUnit
member.d: Pixels per unit to use for dynamically generated bitmaps such as text.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UICanvas.ReferenceResolution
member.d: The resolution the UI layout is designed for. If the screen resolution is larger, the UI will be scaled up, and if it’s smaller, the UI will be scaled down.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UICanvas.MatchWidthOrHeight
member.summary: Match width or height or in between.
member.d: Scale the canvas area with the width as reference (0), the height as reference (1), or something in between (e.g. 0.75).

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UICanvas.CanvasScaler
member.d: The canvas scaler component is used for controlling the scale and pixel density of the children of the canvas.

member.d: Tells the graphic raycaster to ignore graphical components facing away from the camera.

member.d: Indicates the types of objects that should block the raycasts.

member.d: The graphic raycaster components does raycasting against graphical components (such as images).

member.summary: Sets default values of the view.

member.name: T:MarkLight.Views.UI.UIView
member.d: Base class for UI views. Has fields for doing layout such as Width, Height, Margin, Alignment, Offset, etc. and fields for rendering a background image.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UIView.Width
member.d: Specifies the width of the view either in pixels or percents.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UIView.Height
member.d: Specifies the height of the view either in pixels or percents.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UIView.OverrideWidth
member.d: Used to override the layouting logic of inherited views and set the specified width.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UIView.OverrideHeight
member.d: Used to override the layouting logic of inherited views and set the specified height.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UIView.Alignment
member.d: Used to align the view relative to the layout parent region it resides in.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UIView.Margin
member.d: Determines the size of the content region relative the view's width and height. Adding margins to a view does not change its width or height.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UIView.Offset
member.d: Determines the offset of the content region relative to the view's position.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UIView.OffsetFromParent
member.d: Used by parent views to adjust the positioning of its children without affecting the internal offset of the children.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UIView.Pivot
member.d: The normalized position that the view rect transform rotates around.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UIView.RectTransform
member.summary: Position, rotation and scale of the view.
member.d: The view rect transform is used to manipulate the position, rotation and scale of the view in relation to the layout parent view's transform or in world space. For most UIViews the transform manipulated indirectly through other view fields such as Width, Height, Margin, Offset, Alignment and through the UIView's internal layout logic.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UIView.RaycastBlockMode
member.summary: Indicates when raycast should be blocked.
member.d: Enum indicating when raycasts should be blocked by the view.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UIView.Alpha
member.d: Can be used to adjust the alpha color of this view and all its children. E.g. used for fade in/out animations. Is separate from and different from the background color of the view as it affects the children as well.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UIView.IsVisible
member.summary: Indicate if the view is visible.
member.d: Can be used to adjust the visiblity of the view. If set to false the view is made invisible but unlike when deactivating the view, invisible views are still is active and takes up space.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UIView.SortIndex
member.d: The sort index is used by views such as Group and List to sort its child views.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UIView.UpdateRectTransform
member.summary: Indicates if rect transform is updated.
member.d: If set to false the rect transform is not updated by the layout logic. It is used when layouting is done elsewhere.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UIView.UpdateBackground
member.d: If set to false the background image and color is not updated by the view. Is used when the background updates is done elsewhere.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UIView.ImageComponent
member.d: The background image component is responsible for rendering the background image and sprite of the view.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UIView.BackgroundImageEventAlphaThreshold
member.summary: Alpha threshold for letting through events.
member.d: The alpha threshold specifying the minimum alpha a pixel must have for the event to be passed through.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UIView.BackgroundImageFillAmount
member.d: Amount of the Image shown when the Image.type is set to Image.Type.Filled.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UIView.BackgroundImageFillCenter
member.summary: Indicates if center should be filled.
member.d: Boolean indicating whether or not to render the center of a Tiled or Sliced image.

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UIView.BackgroundImageFillClockwise
member.summary: Indicates if the image should be filled clockwise.
member.d: Whether the Image should be filled clockwise (true) or counter-clockwise (false).

member.name: F:MarkLight.Views.UI.UIView.BackgroundImageFillMethod
